name:
StreetPass Mii Plaza
Ver. 5.0
description:
StreetPass Mii Plaza is getting a makeover to make it even more fun and exciting.

If you cannot perform the update from StreetPass Mii Plaza, you can download the update data here.
disclaimer:
This is update data for StreetPass Mii Plaza for Nintendo 3DS.
No icon will be displayed in the Nintendo 3DS system's HOME Menu after downloading this data.
This data will be listed in the Nintendo 3DS Extra Data under Data Management in System Settings. Please do not delete it.
